channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Matrix Authorization Strategy Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Matrix Authorization Strategy Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2226|2024-08-04T07:01:41.175Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20matrix%20authorization%20strategy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Matrix Authorization Strategy Plugin 2.6.1 and earlier does not escape user names shown in the configuration, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability.
